root.name: Computer Scrabble
root.description: With a dictionary of 11,000 words, Computer Scrabble was missing a great number of words, including only the most popular words used in Scrabble. As a result of using such a small dictionary, if a word is entered by the user that is not in the dictionary the computer will ask the user to confirm - if they confirm that it is a word then the computer will trust them: since the game simulated a board game and was single-player, cheating was a complete waste of time.
